group_1.textRight: Eurgh…this is so salty!

group_1.textLeft: It's a drink called butter tea.@It's very common in Tibet.

group_1.textRight: Huh…we haven't had the chance to drink it@what with all the fighting.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed…
Even so, we'll be going on an expedition@to Mongolia tomorrooow!
That's why we have to drink all we can todaaay!

group_1.textRight: (Someone's enjoying herself…)

group_1.textLeft: [chara:105101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Aaaah! So sweet!

group_1.textRight: Maybe all that butter tea did a number@on your tastebuds…

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha… My tastes are quite normal, actually.@I'm fully aware that butter tea is salty.
But I try to convince myself that it's sweet.

group_1.textRight: What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: When I was young…

group_1.narration: "I wanted so badly to drink butter tea@because I was convinced it was sweet...@My mother didn't like it, however,@so we never had it at home."
"Having never had a sweet drink before,@I wanted nothing more than to try one...@And after begging and pleading for ages,@my grandma brewed me a pot of butter tea…@A sweet and light butter tea."

group_1.textRight: So it really was sweet?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.@She added sugar to it.
In order to preserve my dream, she sold her@belongings to afford that expensive sugar.

group_1.narration: "My grandma protected my dreams@to the end... No, not just that.@She made my dreams come true."
"That's why I decided to believe@this notion to the very end, because@that's the only way I can mourn her..."
"I don't want my grandma's hard work@to have been for nothing."

group_1.textRight: …So that's why you keep stubbornly insisting@it's sweet.
Heruka…@Here, drink some more.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:105101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh wow… [chara:105101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:105101:cheek_0][chara:105101:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:105101:lipSynch_1]*Giggle*@How generous!
These are the times I love most.
Talking and chatting with everyone,@drinking butter tea together...
I wish this could last forever.

group_1.textCenter: If you keep guzzling all that down,@you'll get bloated!

group_1.textLeft: Oh no! How terrible!
…No anomalies.

group_1.textRight: You ought to be enjoying yourself with the@others rather than going on patrol.

group_1.textLeft: Not happening.

group_1.textRight: What an unfavorable disposition…

group_1.textLeft: Heruka has decided we'll have our final battle@against the Mongols…
According to the history that Tamaki traced,@what will become of Tibet?

group_1.textRight: There's nothing about the final battle within@this record.
Judging from other records, however,@it's almost certain that they will lose.

group_1.textLeft: …So in the end, after this battle, everyone@in the nunnery will—
…Heruka.

group_1.textRight: There's no need for you to do that.@Let's go back.

group_1.textLeft: I can afford it.

group_1.textRight: It's not a matter of affording it. We've thrust@a formal duel upon them and they accepted.
The general is not the sort of man who would@strike a night ambush on us.

group_1.textLeft: …I know that full well.

group_1.textRight: I'm good at this sort of thing.
I mean, I think everyone has something@they're good at.
In my case, my talents are deception and@surprise.
I've been really good at it ever since I was little…@[chara:105101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:105101:cheek_0][chara:105101:eyeClose_1][chara:105101:lipSynch_1]I used to make the boys cry.

group_1.textLeft: I-I see…

group_1.textRight: …And now I've become a savior.@*Giggle* …Maybe…
Maybe saviors are actually the world's@greatest deceivers.

group_1.textLeft: …You're in quite the good mood tonight.

group_1.textRight: There's nothing wrong with that, is there?@At least for tonight.
…I did well, right?

group_1.textLeft: Why are you asking me?

group_1.textRight: Because you were watching me from afar…@And you gave me the push I needed.

group_1.textLeft: I didn't do much.

group_1.textRight: …I disagree.
I'm sure we're all here for a reason.
If any one of us had been missing...@I doubt we'd have made it this far.

group_1.textLeft: …Including me and my friends?

group_1.textRight: Isn't that obvious?
Thank you so much, from the bottom@of my heart.

group_1.textLeft: …This isn't the end.@It's not the time for goodbyes.

group_1.textRight: No, you're wrong.

group_1.textLeft: Greetings.

group_1.textRight: It's... It is an honor to meet you, Lama Heruka.

group_1.textLeft: No, I can't thank you enough for your financial@support.

group_1.textRight: War is very expensive, after all…@Please, spend whatever you need.

group_1.textLeft: Actually, all of the funds we receive are directed@towards the nunnery's operations.
We don't spend it on battles.

group_1.textRight: I-is that so…?

group_1.textLeft: In any case, the Order of the White Hill is truly@expansive... You're in a position to lead Tibet.
So…please take good care of the people@from now on.

group_1.textRight: [chara:833800:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!
Are you ready, Heruka?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, of course, I'm all set.

group_1.textRight: Is the head priest really joining us?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I requested him to come witness this@for himself.

group_1.textRight: But why…?

group_1.textLeft: This is necessary as well.@Don't you believe me?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, not one bit.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:105101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wh-wh-wh-whaa…?!

group_1.textRight: Just kidding! I believe in you.

group_1.textLeft: D-did you just make fun of me?!@[chara:105101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:105101:cheek_1][chara:105101:face_mtn_ex_020.exp3.json][chara:105101:lipSynch_1]Unacceptable!
[chara:105101:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]*Grumble* *Grumble*

group_1.textRight: What are you…?

group_1.textLeft: Hmph. It's time to go.@We're keeping Rabi waiting.
Aren't you coming, Dolma?

group_1.textRight: I am. It's just...
Why is Heruka so on edge…?
